conversations.content: I have many items in my cart and want to clear out everything except for the electric toothbrush. Please remove the other items and place the order.

<function_thought>
The current items in the cart are: 
1. TechBrand Wireless Mouse with product_id P001,
2. Backpack with product_id P017,
3. Electric Toothbrush with product_id P011.

I need to remove the first two items ('TechBrand Wireless Mouse' and 'Backpack') from the cart and then proceed to checkout only the 'Electric Toothbrush'.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P001")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
Product ID P001 removed from cart.

<function_thought>
The 'TechBrand Wireless Mouse' with product_id P001 has been successfully removed from the cart. The next step is to remove the 'Backpack' with product_id P017.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P017")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
Product ID P017 removed from cart.

<function_thought>
Both unwanted items have been removed from the cart, leaving only the 'Electric Toothbrush'. The next step is to proceed to checkout this remaining item.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P011"])]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<function_thought>
The checkout process requires account verification. I need to retrieve the OTP from the user's email to proceed with the checkout.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_shopping_linked_unread_emails()]</function_call>
